report.title: Dream Psilocybian (poem)
report.author: Trippin Tom
report.bodytext: The following is a poem about mushrooms written by me while coming down from an intense trip. /n /n /n Dream Psilocybian /n =================== /n /n What man can fathom the dreamy angles psilocybian /n That arise from the earth in sickly-sweet parade /n To make insanity out of reason, and open eyes so long blinded? /n /n Electric is the parade of cascading absurdity /n That claws at the soul with talons of flame /n And turns things once cherished and familiar /n Into gargantuan monoliths of alienation and paranoia /n For beyond the wall of dreams lie dismal fields eternal, and a sun that never rises /n /n Through the silent desperation of twilight skies /n Frost bitten by undying winds and darkness eternal /n And shrouded with the depraved laughter of a million madmen /n Lurks the dream psilocybian /n To make insanity out of reason, and open eyes so long blinded
